item.introduction: {"time":1675840088973,"blocks":[{"id":"G49x59b6mJ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Superpower Squad is a blockchain technology-based third-person-shooter game consists of gameplays such as MOBA, RPG, and Roguelike. The game supports solo and team modes, with immersive gaming experience, diverse game mode, and delicate hero & skin & weapon synthesis and upgrade system. Superpower Squad is going to bring eSports culture to web3 for all players. The mobile app has integrated a native in-app wallet to lower down the learning cost of web2 gamers. With innovative gaming model and user-friendly blockchain infrastructure, Superpower Squad will lead the eSports in web3 industry."}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
item.excerpt: Superpower Squad is a blockchain technology-based third-person-shooter game consists of gameplays such as MOBA, RPG, and Roguelike.
item.features_text: {"time":1676283008227,"blocks":[{"id":"R1NDJJLNnM","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"-With eSport spirit, fun, fast competitive multi-genre 3rd person mobile shooter."}},{"id":"yA5RlJTjqF","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"-Innovative blockchain integration, in-app wallet/purchase/marketplace"}},{"id":"91LsWW8hH2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"-UGC(User Generated Content) mode to drive a creative community and user-generated wealth."}},{"id":"jbHF94T0Sl","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"-Deflationary game economy, high playability and sustainability"}},{"id":"DASQuwOjoj","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/photo_2023_01_10_14_22_55_33c61d7c2a.jpg"},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
item.play_to_earn_model: {"time":1675841481439,"blocks":[{"id":"WZlcSsc6pa","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Superpower Squad economics model consists 2 tokens $SQUAD and $ECG."}},{"id":"MeqNM9QVt5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"$SQUAD is our governance token, which can be staked to earn $VSQUAD and voting rights. It is an essential consumption for in-game item synthesis and upgrade."}},{"id":"419T3EO-Iy","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"$ECG is our utility token. Users can purchase mystery boxes; upgrade and synthesize in-game items. It has a stable price of $0.01."}},{"id":"YMlgEPrnlO","type":"mediaLib","data":{"name":"mediaLibraryStrapi"}},{"id":"dyh9OiajIm","type":"image","data":{"file":{"url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b.png","mime":"image/png","height":592,"width":1280,"size":144.26,"alt":"superpower squad earn mode.png","formats":{"large":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/large_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b.png","hash":"large_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b","mime":"image/png","name":"large_superpower squad earn mode.png","path":null,"size":429.78,"width":1000,"height":463},"small":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/small_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b.png","hash":"small_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b","mime":"image/png","name":"small_superpower squad earn mode.png","path":null,"size":124.05,"width":500,"height":231},"medium":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/medium_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b.png","hash":"medium_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b","mime":"image/png","name":"medium_superpower squad earn mode.png","path":null,"size":256.31,"width":750,"height":347},"thumbnail":{"ext":".png","url":"https://d1j2c9jkfhu70p.cloudfront.net/thumbnail_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b.png","hash":"thumbnail_superpower_squad_earn_mode_25feefed6b","mime":"image/png","name":"thumbnail_superpower squad earn mode.png","path":null,"size":37.86,"width":245,"height":113}}},"caption":"","withBorder":false,"stretched":false,"withBackground":false}}],"version":"2.23.2"}
